name: Lootbox Quest
description:
*NOTE: The game CAN be beated, but it may require opening a lot of loot boxes.

The more content, the better? Try in lootbox quest, with thousand of items available in thousands of lootboxes that can be obtained fully ingame. Want to open this door? Open a lootbox to get the key! Want to pass through this jail bars? Open a lootbox! Want to see the credits?? LOOTBOX!!

Enjoy the lootbox quest!
